Title: Open "New Tab"
Description: Verify that Chrome is running and confirm the operation to open a new tab by selecting “New Tab” from the menu icon.
Step:
1. Launch Chrome.
2. Click the menu icon (three dots) at the top right.
3. Select “New Tab”.
ExpectedResults: Criteria: A new tab is added to the tab bar at the top, and two tabs are displayed in total.

Story: Access a specified site by entering a URL
Title: Access yahoo.co.jp
Description: Launch Chrome, enter "yahoo.co.jp" into the URL bar, and verify that the website is displayed correctly.
Step:
1. Launch Chrome.
2. Enter yahoo.co.jp in the URL bar and press Enter.
ExpectedResults: The URL bar at the top shows "yahoo.co.jp" and the Yahoo homepage is displayed normally.

Title: Close Chrome
Description: Verify that Chrome can be properly closed while it is running.

Title: Bookmark yahoo.co.jp
Description: After accessing yahoo.co.jp, verify the operation of adding a bookmark by clicking the star icon in the URL bar.
Step:
1. Confirm Chrome is running.
2. Enter yahoo.co.jp in the URL bar.
3. Click the star icon to add a bookmark.
ExpectedResults: The star icon in the URL bar changes to a filled star icon.

Title: Open Mobile Bookmarks
Description: Verify the operation of opening the saved “Mobile Bookmarks” folder by selecting “Bookmarks” from the menu.
Step:
1. Click the menu icon (three dots) at the top right.
2. From the displayed menu, select “Bookmarks”.
3. Select “Mobile Bookmarks”.
ExpectedResults: The Mobile Bookmarks screen displays "Yahoo! JAPAN".

Story: Change the name of an existing bookmark
Title: Rename the "Yahoo! JAPAN" bookmark to “Changed Yahoo”
Description: Verify the operation of editing the existing "Yahoo! JAPAN" bookmark and changing its name to “Changed Yahoo”.
Step:
1. Click the bookmark options menu (three dots) next to [Yahoo! JAPAN].
2. Select “Edit”.
3. Change the name to “Changed Yahoo”.
4. Save.
ExpectedResults: "Changed Yahoo" is displayed in the Mobile Bookmarks screen.
